sections.text: series; prohibited acts.A protected series may not:(1) be an acquiring, acquired, converting, converted, merging, or surviving organization;(2) participate in a domestication; or(3) be a party to or be formed, organized, established, or created in a transaction substantially like a merger, interest exchange, conversion, or domestication.SourceLaws 2018, LB1121, ยง 29;Laws 2019, LB78, ยง 15.

21-528.Protected series; prohibited acts.

A protected series may not:

(1) be an acquiring, acquired, converting, converted, merging, or surviving organization;

(2) participate in a domestication; or

(3) be a party to or be formed, organized, established, or created in a transaction substantially like a merger, interest exchange, conversion, or domestication.

SourceLaws 2018, LB1121, ยง 29;Laws 2019, LB78, ยง 15.
